scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && esbuild ./src/index.ts --bundle --minify --keep-names --platform=node --target=esnext --format=esm --out-extension:.js=.mjs --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --outdir=./dist
scripts.watch: rm -rf ./dist && esbuild --watch ./src/index.ts --bundle --minify --keep-names --platform=node --target=esnext --format=esm --out-extension:.js=.mjs --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --outdir=./dist
scripts.archive: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && rm package-lock.json && zip -rj "../../../zip_builds/main-server-$(date +"%Y%m%d%H%M%S").zip" ./dist/*
